creator: nishant.noida79@gmail.com
text:
I have a requirement to add image to header of a .doc file (97-2003 format). I am contemplating use of HWPF for the same. While I could replace text in header, i am unable to find a way to remove the current header and replace it with an image file in header.
I tried to go through other resources and forums but got no resolution on this using HWPF.
Please advise if its feasible using HWPFDocument.

Thanks

Unfortunately if you didn't get responses on the other channels there is not much chance of an immediate response here as mostly the same people watch the issues here as well (even less as mostly only devs look at issues, so forums/stackoverflow/mailinglists is usually a much better place to ask questions)...
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
